Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Vase
Description: Crude small biconical vase with a flat circular base, small short neck and protruding lip, made from a beige coloured and crude paste. The base, as well as the body, bear obvious throwing marks. Finger print on the body.
